items.name: Nairobi National Park
items.description: A wildlife park in Nairobi offering a unique blend of nature and city.

items.name: Giraffe Centre
items.description: A conservation center for the endangered Rothschild giraffe.

items.name: Karen Blixen Museum
items.description: A museum located at the former home of Danish author Karen Blixen.

items.name: David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust
items.description: A sanctuary for orphaned elephants, focusing on conservation efforts.

items.name: Bomas of Kenya
items.description: A cultural center showcasing traditional Kenyan music and dance.

items.name: Nairobi Railway Museum
items.description: A museum displaying Kenya's railway history, including old locomotives and carriages.

items.name: Kazuri Beads
items.description: A pottery workshop producing handmade ceramic beads, pottery, and other jewelry.

items.name: Nairobi National Museum
items.description: A museum that exhibits Kenya's rich heritage, culture, and natural history.
